title: The service has a no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy
tosdr.tldr:
The terms of service states "There will be no refunds or credits for partial months of service, downgrade refunds, or refunds for months unused with an open account; however, the service will remain active for the length of the paid billing period." 

"We offer no refunds if you change your mind after payment. ALL SALES ARE FINAL."

Conclusion - No refunds
